TEXT.TITLE: HUGHES' CANADA RIG COUNT DOWN 19 THIS WEEK
TEXT.BODY: Drilling activity slowed down substantially in Canada. The number of active rotary rigs fell by 19 in the week ended today, Hughes Tool Co reported. A total of 66 rigs were working during the week, compared with 71 one year ago, it said. Reuter
